p: Sabouraud dextrose agar (SDA), Sabouraud dextrose broth (SDB), and peptone were obtained from HiMedia (Mumbai, India). Certified standards of DON and ZEA were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich (Bengaluru, India). Immunoaffinity columns specific for DON and ZEA were procured from Vicam (Waters business, USA). The other chemicals used in the study were analytical grade and obtained from Merck Millipore (Bengaluru, India).
